section.p:
If you are an initiate it costs only 10 Shards to purchase Nisoderu's blessing.
A non-initiate must pay 25 Shards.
Cross off the money and mark SANCTITY in the Blessings box on your Adventure Sheet. The blessing works by allowing you to try again when you fail a SANCTITY roll. It is good for only one reroll. When you use the blessing, cross it off your Adventure Sheet. You can have only one SANCTITY blessing at any one time. Once it is used up, you can return to any branch of the temple of Nisoderu to buy a new one.
